mapper.select: /*kr.kosmo.jobkorea.pcs.dao.PcsDao*/ SELECT PL.purch_list_no , SP.supply_nm , PD.prod_nm , MC.l_ct_cd , PL.purch_qty , PD.purchase_price , PL.desired_delivery_date , WH.warehouse_nm , PL.purch_mng_id FROM tb_scm_purchase_list as PL LEFT JOIN tb_order as OD ON PL.order_cd = OD.order_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_warehouse as WH ON OD.warehouse_cd = WH.warehouse_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_supply as SP ON PL.supply_cd = SP.supply_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_product as PD ON PL.supply_cd = PD.supply_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_m_category as MC ON PD.m_ct_cd = MC.m_ct_cd ORDER BY purch_list_no DESC
